verses.kjv: Praise ye the LORD: for it is good to sing praises unto our God; for it is pleasant; and praise is comely.
verses.ct: Praise the LORD! It is good to sing praises to our God — it is delightful, and praise is fitting.

verses.kjv: The LORD doth build up Jerusalem: he gathereth together the outcasts of Israel.
verses.ct: The LORD is rebuilding Jerusalem; he is gathering the scattered people of Israel.

verses.kjv: He healeth the broken in heart, and bindeth up their wounds.
verses.ct: He heals those whose hearts are shattered and bandages their wounds.

verses.kjv: He telleth the number of the stars; he calleth them all by their names.
verses.ct: He counts every star and knows each one by name.

verses.kjv: Great is our Lord, and of great power: his understanding is infinite.
verses.ct: Our Lord is great and mighty in power; his understanding has no limit.

verses.kjv: The LORD lifteth up the meek: he casteth the wicked down to the ground.
verses.ct: The LORD lifts up the humble but throws the wicked to the ground.

verses.kjv: Sing unto the LORD with thanksgiving; sing praise upon the harp unto our God:
verses.ct: Sing to the LORD with gratitude; play music on the harp for our God.

verses.kjv: Who covereth the heaven with clouds, who prepareth rain for the earth, who maketh grass to grow upon the mountains.
verses.ct: He spreads clouds across the heavens, sends rain to the earth, and makes grass spring up on the mountains.

verses.kjv: He giveth to the beast his food, and to the young ravens which cry.
verses.ct: He provides food for the animals and feeds the young ravens when they call out.

verses.kjv: He delighteth not in the strength of the horse: he taketh not pleasure in the legs of a man.
verses.ct: He takes no pleasure in the power of a horse or in the strength of a warrior's legs.

verses.kjv: The LORD taketh pleasure in them that fear him, in those that hope in his mercy.
verses.ct: The LORD takes pleasure in those who deeply revere him, in those who put their hope in his mercy.

verses.kjv: Praise the LORD, O Jerusalem; praise thy God, O Zion.
verses.ct: Praise the LORD, Jerusalem! Praise your God, Zion!

verses.kjv: For he hath strengthened the bars of thy gates; he hath blessed thy children within thee.
verses.ct: He has reinforced the gates that protect you and blessed your children within your walls.

verses.kjv: He maketh peace in thy borders, and filleth thee with the finest of the wheat.
verses.ct: He brings peace to your borders and satisfies you with the finest wheat.

verses.kjv: He sendeth forth his commandment upon earth: his word runneth very swiftly.
verses.ct: He sends his command across the earth, and his word moves with incredible speed.

verses.kjv: He giveth snow like wool: he scattereth the hoarfrost like ashes.
verses.ct: He sends snow that blankets the ground like wool and scatters frost like ashes.

verses.kjv: He casteth forth his ice like morsels: who can stand before his cold?
verses.ct: He hurls down hail like small stones — who can endure his bitter cold?

verses.kjv: He sendeth out his word, and melteth them: he causeth his wind to blow, and the waters flow.
verses.ct: Then he sends his word and melts it all; he makes his wind blow, and the waters flow again.

verses.kjv: He sheweth his word unto Jacob, his statutes and his judgments unto Israel.
verses.ct: He has revealed his word to Jacob, his laws and regulations to Israel.

verses.kjv: He hath not dealt so with any nation: and as for his judgments, they have not known them. Praise ye the LORD.
verses.ct: He has not done this for any other nation — they do not know his regulations. Praise the LORD!
